Complete Quest: A Path for Aragorn: Trolls
Complete Quest: A Path for Aragorn: Tents
Turgon can be found at the southern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Turgon.
'You have done much. Perhaps Thorongil even looks up to you.\n\n'I hope that I am here to greet him upon the docks of the Harlond so that I may give him your regards.'
Aragorn will need the port of the Harlond cleared if he and his men are to make landfall with haste.

You trust Turgon and decide to share with him your knowledge of Aragorn's ships en route from Pelargir.

'This is indeed good news. The number of men under the command of Thorongil will certainly turn the battle in our favour.

'I have a plan to attack those Orcs in the Harlond so that we may win this battle. I will require your expertise in combat.'
Turgon can be found at the southern gate of the Rammas.\n\nYou should speak with Turgon and assist him with clearing the port of the Harlond.
